name: Note
description: Represents a note that a user can attach to a parent object record.
summary:
The object `{Note}` in the application Salesforce represents a note or a piece of information associated with other records. It consists of the following attributes:

- **Id (type: id)**: A unique identifier for the Note.
- **IsDeleted (type: boolean)**: Indicates whether the Note has been deleted.
- **ParentId (type: reference)**: References the parent record to which the Note is associated.
- **Title (type: string)**: The title or subject of the Note.
- **IsPrivate (type: boolean)**: Specifies if the Note is private.
- **Body (type: textarea)**: The main content or body of the Note.
- **OwnerId (type: reference)**: References the user who owns the Note.
- **CreatedDate (type: datetime)**: The date and time when the Note was created.
- **CreatedById (type: reference)**: References the user who created the Note.
- **LastModifiedDate (type: datetime)**: The date and time when the Note was last modified.
- **LastModifiedById (type: reference)**: References the user who last modified the Note.
- **SystemModstamp (type: datetime)**: System-generated timestamp for tracking the last update to the Note.

This object allows users to create, manage, and associate notes with other records within Salesforce, providing a way to document additional information related to various entities in the system.
label: Note
